arts.ttl: Serie A | Inter 1-1 Napoli: Match Report
arts.sum: Hakan Calhanoglu delivered a stunning long-range strike to equalize for Inter Milan after Scott McTominay had given Napoli an early lead, but he also missed a penalty, hitting the upright as the match ended in a 1-1 draw at San Siro. The clash was crucial, with only a point separating the two teams prior to kick-off. Following the weekend’s results, Atalanta, Lazio, and Fiorentina were also in close contention with Napoli at the top of the Serie A standings. Inter made some adjustments to their lineup, with only Carlos Augusto unavailable. arts.ttl: Giovanni Manna: ‘Inter and Atalanta superior to Napoli’
arts.sum: Napoli sporting director Giovanni Manna shared his thoughts ahead of the crucial match against Inter Milan, emphasizing the competitive landscape of Serie A. Speaking to DAZN, Manna reaffirmed the club’s commitment to their initial goals, stating, “We have been consistent with our initial message; the president reiterated it. We are focused on our daily work. It’s a beautiful league, and the level is rising as we can see in European competitions.
